A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The essence of Star Wars fused into a fresh storyline. Rian Johnson took every Star Wars trope and subverted it\, a move that has left a lot of fans shaken or upset. The most nuanced Star Wars yet\, with characters so full of conflict that you feel it too. Visually stunning with a dazzling style\, it's just as exciting on the third watch as it was on the first.
